name: The Books
description: '''The Books''' were an American-Dutch duo, formed in [[New York City]] in 1999, consisting of guitarist and vocalist [[Zammuto_(band)|Nick Zammuto]] and cellist Paul de Jong. Their music typically incorporated [[Sampling (music)|samples]] of obscure sounds and speech. They released three critically acclaimed albums on the German label Tomlab, and released their fourth studio album, ''[[The Way Out (The Books album)|The Way Out]]'', on [[Temporary Residence Limited]] in July 2010.
